caseStudies.title: gamerbot
caseStudies.description: At underbelly we love foosball. We also love slack, so we created a slack bot to keep track of all the games we play. We then built a web view to see all our stats in one place

caseStudies.title: wiki
caseStudies.description: Our company doubled in 2019 and all our new hire documents were located in a dropbox folder. Our dev team thought we could do better. Our wiki hosts all our company information and is now considered our Employee Handbook. The wiki includes a very powerful search engine powered by algolia. All the information is now hosted in Contentful. We have also created a slackbot to run a search on the wiki directly from slack. The slackbot is now an opensource project that you can use and contribute to. See the link below
